name: StudentEngagement-Students-GET-getHolds
description: [Student Engagement] GET /students/{ID}/holds — DEPRECATED. Retrieves a collection of student holds assigned to the specified student ID.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: holdType
schema.description: Filter for holds matching these hold types.

schema.name: reason
schema.description: Filter for holds matching this hold reason.

schema.name: showInactive
schema.description: Parameter that will include inactive holds along with the active ones.

name: StudentEngagement-Students-GET-getStudents
description: [Student Engagement] GET /students — Retrieves a collection of students.

schema.name: programOfStudy
schema.description: For students who haven't matriculated, the program of study they either applied to or have been admitted to. For matriculated students, the primary program of study from their reporting record.

schema.name: search
schema.description: A fuzzy search string that matches student IDs and names. Example: search=bri%20book returns the student Brian Booker.

name: StudentEngagement-Students-GET-getStudents_1
description: [Student Engagement] GET /students/{ID} — Retrieves a student instance.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

name: StudentEngagement-Students-GET-getHolds_1
description: [Student Engagement] GET /students/{ID}/holds/{subresourceID} — DEPRECATED. Retrieves a single student hold instance for the specified student.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: subresourceID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the subresource.
